title: 第 14 集 放风筝！ | Flying a kite!

data.en: Flying a kite!

data.zh: 今天是一个阳光明媚的日子。
data.en: It is a bright, sunny day.
Peppa and her family are in the park.
They are going to fly a kite!

data.zh: 乔治要第一个把风筝放起来。
data.en: George is going to fly the kite first.

data.zh: 乔治尽全力跑。但是风筝就是不能飞起来。
data.en: George runs as fast as he can. But the kite won't fly.
George! You're doing it all wrong!
You didn't run fast enough.
Now, it's my turn.
Peppa runs as fast as she can.

data.zh: 但是风筝仍然没有飞起来。
data.en: But the kite still won't fly.

data.zh: 如果没有风，风筝是飞不起来的，
data.en: The kite won't fly if there isn't any wind,
no matter how fast you run.
Oh!

data.zh: 我们再等等吧，有点风起来就可以了。
data.en: We'll just have to wait, until the wind picks up a bit.
Oh!
Look, it's getting windy!

data.zh: 现在起风了，风筝可以飞起来了！
data.en: Now that it is windy, the kite can fly!
The wind is quite strong now.
The wind is very strong now.
George! Wahhh!
Peppa!
Thank you, Daddy!
Daddy Pig flies the kite.
Hurray!
Higher, higher!

data.zh: 猪爸爸的风筝放得很不错。
data.en: Daddy Pig flies the kite very well.
WoW!

data.zh: 没错，在这种事情上我算是专家了。
data.en: Yes, I am a bit of an expert at these things.

data.zh: 小心那边的树！你会把风筝卡在树上的。
data.en: Watch out for the trees! You might get the kite stuck in one.

data.zh: 不用担心，我知道我在做什么。
data.en: Don't worry, I know what I'm doing.

data.zh: 哦，糟糕。猪爸爸把风筝卡在了一棵树上。
data.en: Oh, dear. Daddy Pig has got the kite caught in a tree.
Oh, no!
Hmmm!

data.zh: 不用担心，乔治。爸爸会把风筝拿下来的。
data.en: Don't worry, George. Daddy will get the kite down.
Hurray!
Err... yes.

data.zh: 小心点！那里有一个大泥坑！
data.en: Careful! There's a big muddy puddle!

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢跳进泥坑玩。
data.en: Peppa and George love to jump in muddy puddles.

data.zh: 我们可以跳进泥坑里吗？求你们了！
data.en: Can we jump in the puddle? Please!

data.zh: 不行。我不想你们浑身都是泥。
data.en: No. I don't want you covered in mud.
Ohhhhhhhhh...
Stand back, children.
Please be careful, Daddy Pig!
I know what I'm doing.
Please be careful!
Just a bit further, Daddy!

data.zh: 猪爸爸，你太重了树枝撑不住了！
data.en: Daddy Pig, you are much too heavy for that branch!

data.zh: 胡说！我知道我自己有多重！
data.en: Nonsense! I know exactly how heavy I am. There!
Hurray!
Daddy Pig has rescued the kite!
Whoa!

data.zh: 哦，糟糕。每个人身上都是泥了。
data.en: Oh, dear. Everyone is covered in mud.
It's only mud.
Luckily, Daddy Pig hasn't hurt himself.

data.zh: 而风筝也从树上拿下来了！
data.en: And the kite is out of the tree!
Hurray!

data.zh: 妈妈。。。现在我们都全身是泥了，
data.en: Mummy... Now that we are all muddy,

data.zh: 我们可以跳进泥坑里玩了吧？
data.en: can we jump in the puddle?

data.zh: 我想可以了。毕竟你们不会更脏了。。。
data.en: I suppose so. After all, you can't get any muddier...

data.zh: 但我想猪爸爸得去洗洗才行。。。
data.en: And I think Daddy Pig is going to be doing the washing...
Oh!

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！
data.en: Peppa and George love jumping up and down in muddy puddles!

data.zh: 妈妈和爸爸也喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！
data.en: Mummy and Daddy love jumping up and down in muddy puddles!

data.zh: 大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！
data.en: Everyone loves jumping  up and down in muddy puddles!

data.zh: 在泥坑里跳来跳去就和放风筝一样有趣！
data.en: Jumping up and down in muddy puddles is just as much fun as flying the kite!
